chapters.title: Chapter 31:  The Way of the Predator
chapters.info: Kiem Lewin, p. 542—Young woman from Emond's Field. When Egwene was thirteen, Mat jumped into the river to save Kiem from drowning. She was not drowning—one of her friends had merely dunked her under—but Mat came running. The men of Emond's Field had made fun of Mat for months because of the incident. See also al'Hune, Jer.
